'''Improved Crococannon''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Improved Crococannon is obtainable from the [[Realm Depot]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|24|x=240}}.

This item's blueprint was previously obtainable from the [[Spino Doubleblaster]] event.

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=90}}.
